channel.title: ü§∫ The Templario
channel.description: # [color=steblue]**ü§∫ The Templar**[/color] **üõ°Ô∏è Protect** (Night) - Protect a player from visits from any specific non-[color=steblue]**BD**[/color] class. [color=FFF666]For example, if you protect someone from [color=D72A28]**The Apostle**[/color], and [color=D72A28]**The Apostle**[/color] actually visits them, you will occupy and attack [color=D72A28]**The Apostle**[/color]. Cannot protect from the same class more than once.[/color] **(Infinite uses)** ___ **‚öîÔ∏è Duel** (Night) - Identify a player's non-[color=steblue]**BD**[/color] class. Kill them if you are correct, bypassing **everything**. Otherwise, suicide. [color=FFF666]For example, if you duel someone you identify as [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] you will kill them. But if they were [color=steblue]**The Sheriff**[/color], you'd die instead.[/color] **(Infinite uses)**

item.title: ü§∫ The Templario
item.dc:creator: Conduit
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Why a different class, and why limited? Also I should clarify it‚Äôs almost the same as Smite, except more general-purpose.

I thought this since being able to just do Protect (Assassin/NK) you‚Äôll just become a knight with infinite Armored passive. I think a better idea would be to make it so you can‚Äôt chose the same class twice

Otherwise, suicide.

I took this as you‚Äôll die if you dont use this ability, which is kind of dumb since it has two abilities.

item.title: ü§∫ The Templario
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I was looking at a thesaurus for ‚Äúdefend‚Äù and couldn‚Äôt find anything half-good except for ‚Äúprotect‚Äù.

Maybe a different class with limited shots of this ability could work?

Why a different class, and why limited? Also I should clarify it‚Äôs almost the same as Smite, except more general-purpose.

This is‚Ä¶ not very good. You‚Äôll likely just be dead by N1 since no one claimed.

You don‚Äôt have to yolo n1. I don‚Äôt know why you‚Äôd be dead N1.

Read full topic

item.title: ü§∫ The Templario
item.dc:creator: Conduit
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Protect (Night) - Protect a player from visits from any specific non- BD class. For example, if you protect someone from The Apostle , and The Apostle actually visits them, you will occupy and attack The Apostle . (Infinite uses)

This looks interesting. Maybe a different class with limited shots of this ability could work? Also I feel Protect is a pretty basic name but that just might be me.

Shrimpy:

Duel (Night) - Identify a player‚Äôs non- BD class. Kill them if you are correct, bypassing everything . Otherwise, suicide. For example, if you duel someone you identify as The Mastermind you will kill them. But if they were The Sheriff , you‚Äôd die instead. (Infinite uses)

This is‚Ä¶ not very good. You‚Äôll likely just be dead by N1 since no one claimed.

Read full topic

item.title: ü§∫ The Templario
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The Templar

Protect (Night) - Protect a player from visits from any specific non-BD class. For example, if you protect someone from The Apostle, and The Apostle actually visits them, you will occupy and attack The Apostle. Cannot protect from the same class more than once. (Infinite uses)

Duel (Night) - Identify a player‚Äôs non-BD class. Kill them if you are correct, bypassing everything. Otherwise, suicide. For example, if you duel someone you identify as The Mastermind you will kill them. But if they were The Sheriff, you‚Äôd die instead. (Infinite uses)

Read full topic
